name: Fallout: Brotherhood of Steel
synopsis: In this gritty and darkly humorous 3rd person action adventure the players join the courageous Brotherhood of Steel whose mission is to maintain peace in the grim post-nuclear world of Fallout.  Challenged by hordes of raiders, ghouls, mutants and other radioactive nightmares the players use a combination of intense combat strategies including melee/ranged combat to fulfill their daunting task of defeating the threats in hopes of restoring humanity in a nearly unlivable universe.  Welcome to the wasteland.
